anya-e0102n9:2_1: Aṭṭhannaṁ pana ñāṇānaṁ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā,
anya-e0102n9:2_12: Tasmā taṁ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ ādiṁ katvā etesu ñāṇesu yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n9:3_3: Udayabbayañāṇaṁ hi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṁ sallakkhetuṁ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0102n9:4_1: Lakkhaṇāni pana kissa amanasikārā kena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhahanti?
anya-e0102n9:4_2: Aniccalakkhaṇaṁ tāva udayabbayānaṁ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:4_3: Dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:4_4: Anattalakkhaṇaṁ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:4_5: Udayabbayampana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:4_6: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṁ manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:4_7: Nānādhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:5_8: Uppādavayaññathattaṁ aniccalakkhaṇaṁ hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto vā ākāravikāro.
anya-e0102n9:6_1: 3.15) vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ dukkhaṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n9:7_1: 3.15) pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ anattā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n9:8_0: Tayidaṁ sabbampi ayaṁ yogāvacaro upakkilesavimuttena vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātena udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkheti.
anya-e0102n9:11_1: Tassevaṁ sallakkhetvā punappunaṁ ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti rūpārūpadhamme tulayato tīrayato taṁ ñāṇaṁ tikkhaṁ hutvā vahati,
anya-e0102n9:11_3: ñāṇe tikkhe vahante saṅkhāresu lahuṁ upaṭṭhahantesu uppādaṁ vā ṭhitiṁ vā pavattaṁ vā nimittaṁ vā na sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n9:11_5: Tassa ‘‘evaṁ uppajjitvā evaṁ nāma saṅkhāragataṁ nirujjhatī’’ti passato etasmiṁ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanaṁ nāma vipassanāñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n9:12_2: taṁ ārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassati .
anya-e0102n9:22_0: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:23_2: tena vuccati ‘ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa’’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.51-52).
anya-e0102n9:24_1: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti yaṁkiñci ārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā,
anya-e0102n9:24_4: ārammaṇaṁ khayato vayato paṭisaṅkhāya uppannassa ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassane yā paññā,
anya-e0102n9:24_6: Taṁ kathaṁ hotīti ayaṁ tāva kathetukamyatāpucchāya attho.
anya-e0102n9:25_0: Tattha rūpārammaṇatā cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti rūpārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0102n9:25_1: Atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti attho.
anya-e0102n9:25_2: Taṁ ārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāti taṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā,
anya-e0102n9:25_4: Tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassatīti yena cittena taṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ khayato vayato diṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:25_5: tassa cittassa aparena cittena bhaṅgaṁ anupassatīti attho.
anya-e0102n9:26_0: Ettha ca anupassatīti anu anu passati,
anya-e0102n9:26_1: anekehi ākārehi punappunaṁ passatīti attho. Tenāha –
anya-e0102n9:27_0: Tattha yasmā bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi,
anya-e0102n9:27_1: tasmā so bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro sabbaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ aniccato anupassati,
anya-e0102n9:27_4: dukkhassa ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
anya-e0102n9:28_4: Tasmā etasmiṁ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti diṭṭhe saṅkhāragate nibbindati,
anya-e0102n9:28_8: So evaṁ arajjanto lokikeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṁ nirodheti,
anya-e0102n9:29_0: Atha vā so evaṁ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ,
anya-e0102n9:30_3: Ayampi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṁ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṁ pariccajanato,
anya-e0102n9:30_4: saṅkhatadosadassanena ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n9:30_5: Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu yathāvuttena nayena kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0102n9:31_1: Idānissa tehi ñāṇehi yesaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n9:31_2: taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṁ pajahatī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:32_1: Gāthāsu pana vatthusaṅkamanāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā puna yena cittena bhaṅgo diṭṭho,
anya-e0102n9:32_3: Paññāya ca vivaṭṭanāti udayaṁ pahāya vaye santiṭṭhanā.
anya-e0102n9:32_4: Āvajjanābalañcevāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā puna bhaṅgārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgadassanatthaṁ anantarameva āvajjanasamatthatā.
anya-e0102n9:33_0: 745.Ārammaṇaanvayena ubho ekavavatthanāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anvayena anugamanena yathā idaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:33_2: anāgatepi bhijjissatīti evaṁ ubhinnaṁ ekasabhāveneva vavatthāpananti attho.
anya-e0102n9:39_0: Nirodhe adhimuttatāti evaṁ ubhinnaṁ bhaṅgavasena ekavavatthānaṁ katvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe
anya-e0102n9:39_1: adhimuttatā taggarutā tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti attho.
anya-e0102n9:39_2: Vayalakkhaṇavipassanāti esā vayalakkhaṇavipassanā nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:40_1: Bhaṅgañca anupassatīti tassārammaṇassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassati.
anya-e0102n9:40_2: Suññato ca upaṭṭhānanti tassevaṁ bhaṅgaṁ anupassato ‘‘saṅkhārāva bhijjanti,
anya-e0102n9:40_4: na añño koci atthī’’ti suññato upaṭṭhānaṁ ijjhati.
anya-e0102n9:46_0: Adhipaññāvipassanāti yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:47_0: 747.Kusalo tīsu anupassanāsūti aniccānupassanādīsu tīsu cheko bhikkhu.
anya-e0102n9:47_1: Catasso ca vipassanāsūti nibbidādīsu ca catūsu vipassanāsu.
anya-e0102n9:47_2: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatāti khayato vayato suññatoti imasmiñca tividhe upaṭṭhāne kusalatāya.
anya-e0102n9:47_3: Nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatīti sassatadiṭṭhiādīsu nānappakārāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati.
anya-e0102n9:48_2: abhinnameva bhijjatī’’ti pavattamanasikāro dubbalabhājanassa viya bhijjamānassa,
anya-e0102n9:48_4: tilānaṁ viya bhajjiyamānānaṁ sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ uppādaṭṭhitipavattanimittaṁ vissajjetvā bhedameva passati.
anya-e0102n9:48_5: So yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso pokkharaṇītīre vā nadītīre vā ṭhito thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakapiṭṭhe
anya-e0102n9:48_6: mahantamahantāni udakabubbuḷakāni uppajjitvā uppajjitvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ bhijjamānāni passeyya,
anya-e0102n9:48_7: evameva sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantīti passati.
anya-e0102n9:48_8: Evarūpaṁ hi yogāvacaraṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n9:50_0: Evaṁ lokaṁ avekkhantaṁ, maccurājā na passatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 170);
anya-e0102n9:51_1: Tassevaṁ ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantī’’ti abhiṇhaṁ passato aṭṭhānisaṁsaparivāraṁ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṁ balappattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:59_1: Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ khayavayabhedanirodhārammaṇaṁ bhaṅgānupassanaṁ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa
anya-e0102n9:59_2: sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu pabhedakā saṅkhārā sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa sīhabyagghadīpiacchataracchayakkharakkhasacaṇḍagoṇacaṇḍakukkurapabhinnamadacaṇḍahatthighoraāsīvisaasanivicakkasusānaraṇabhūmijalitaaṅgārakāsuādayo
anya-e0102n9:59_6: anāgate nibbattanakasaṅkhārāpi evameva nirujjhissantī’’ti passato etasmiṁ ṭhāne bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0102n9:60_1: ekissā kira itthiyā tayo puttā rājaparādhikā,
anya-e0102n9:60_4: Athassā jeṭṭhaputtassa sīsaṁ chinditvā majjhimassa chindituṁ ārabhiṁsu.
anya-e0102n9:60_5: Sā jeṭṭhassa sīsaṁ chinnaṁ majjhimassa ca chijjamānaṁ disvā kaniṭṭhamhi ālayaṁ vissajji ‘‘ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:60_6: Tattha tassā itthiyā jeṭṭhaputtassa chinnasīsadassanaṁ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:60_8: ‘‘ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī’’ti kaniṭṭhaputtamhi ālayavissajjanaṁ viya ‘‘anāgatepi nibbattanakasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n9:60_10: Tassevaṁ passato etasmiṁ ṭhāne uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:61_1: ekā kira pūtipajā itthī dasa dārake vijāyi.
anya-e0102n9:61_5: Sā nava dārake mate dasamañca mīyamānaṁ disvā kucchigate ālayaṁ vissajji ‘‘ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:61_6: Tattha tassā itthiyā navannaṁ dārakānaṁ maraṇānussaraṇaṁ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:61_7: hatthagatassa mīyamānabhāvadassanaṁ viya yogino paccuppannānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:61_9: Tassevaṁ passato etasmiṁ khaṇe uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:62_6: Tasmā yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso nagaradvāre tisso aṅgārakāsuyo olokayamāno sayaṁ na bhāyati,
anya-e0102n9:62_9: Yathā vā pana cakkhumā puriso khadirasūlaṁ ayosūlaṁ suvaṇṇasūlanti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaṁ sūlattayaṁ olokayamāno sayaṁ na bhāyati,
anya-e0102n9:62_10: kevalaṁ hissa ‘‘ye ye imesu sūlesu nipatissanti,
anya-e0102n9:62_14: sūlattayasadisesu ca tīsu bhavesu ‘‘atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā,
anya-e0102n9:62_17: Yasmā panassa kevalaṁ sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatā saṅkhārā byasanāpannā sappaṭibhayā hutvā bhayato upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0102n9:63_0: Evaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhāne panassa ayaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n9:64_4: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhātī’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.227).
anya-e0102n9:65_2: Aniccato manasikaronto hi saṅkhārānaṁ maraṇameva passati,
anya-e0102n9:65_5: Dukkhato manasikaronto hi sukhasammatāyapi pavattiyā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanabhāvameva passati,
anya-e0102n9:65_7: Anattato manasikaronto pana ubhayampetaṁ suññagāmaṁ viya marīcigandhabbanagarādīni viya ca rittaṁ tucchaṁ suññaṁ assāmikaṁ apariṇāyakaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n9:65_8: Tenassa nimittañca pavattañca ubhayaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0102n9:68_1: Tassa taṁ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu neva tāṇaṁ, na leṇaṁ, na gati,
anya-e0102n9:68_3: Sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso vā na hoti.
anya-e0102n9:68_10: nava ca sattāvāsā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā viya ca,
anya-e0102n9:68_11: sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n9:69_1: Sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi savāḷakamiva vanagahanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:69_9: Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṁviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati,
anya-e0102n9:69_10: evamevāyaṁ yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṁ nirassādaṁ ādīnavameva passati.
anya-e0102n9:69_11: Tassevaṁ passato ādīnavañāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:70_1: Uppādo bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:70_15: upāyāso bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:71_2: upāyāso dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:72_2: upāyāso sāmisanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:73_2: upāyāso saṅkhārāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:80_0: Dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:81_2: Tena vuccati ‘‘bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.53).
anya-e0102n9:82_6: Gatīti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0102n9:82_12: Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva ādīnavañāṇassa vatthuvasena vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:82_14: Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṁ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:84_0: Āyūhanaṁ paṭisandhiṁ, ñāṇaṁ ādīnave ida’’nti ca.
anya-e0102n9:86_0: Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇantiādi pana ādīnavañāṇassa paṭipakkhañāṇadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:86_1: Bhayatupaṭṭhānena vā ādīnavaṁ disvā ubbiggahadayānaṁ abhayampi atthi khemaṁ nirādīnavanti assāsajananatthampi etaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:86_2: Yasmā vā panassa uppādādayo bhayato sūpaṭṭhitā honti,
anya-e0102n9:86_4: tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena siddhassa ādīnavañāṇassa ānisaṁsadassanatthampetaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:87_5: Tasmā ‘‘uppādo dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:87_6: Evaṁ santepi bhayākārena dukkhākārena sāmisākārenāti evaṁ ākāranānattato pavattivasenevettha nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:88_0: Dasañāṇe pajānātīti ādīnavañāṇaṁ pajānanto uppādādivatthukāni pañca,
anya-e0102n9:88_1: anuppādādivatthukāni pañcāti dasa ñāṇāni pajānāti paṭivijjhati sacchikaroti.
anya-e0102n9:88_2: Dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ kusalatāti ādīnavañāṇassa ceva santipadañāṇassa cāti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ kusalatāya.
anya-e0102n9:88_3: Nānādiṭṭhīsuna kampatīti paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānādivasena pavattāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati.
anya-e0102n9:91_1: So evaṁ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passanto sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate sabhedake saṅkhāragate nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramati.
anya-e0102n9:92_3: evameva ayampi yogīrājahaṁso suparidiṭṭhādīnave sabhedake saṅkhāragate nābhiramati.
anya-e0102n9:92_4: Bhāvanārāmatāya pana bhāvanāratiyā samannāgatattā sattasu anupassanāsuyeva ramati.
anya-e0102n9:93_0: Yathā ca suvaṇṇapañjare pakkhitto sīho migarājā nābhiramati,
anya-e0102n9:94_0: Yathā ca sabbaseto sattapatiṭṭho iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo chaddanto nāgarājā nagaramajjhe nābhiramati,
anya-e0102n9:94_3: anuppādo khemantiādinā nayena diṭṭhe santipadeyeva abhiramati,
anya-e0102n9:96_0: 755. Taṁ panetaṁ purimena ñāṇadvayena atthato ekaṁ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n9:97_1: sabbasaṅkhāre bhayato addasāti bhayatupaṭṭhānaṁ nāma jātaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:97_2: Tesuyeva saṅkhāresu ādīnavaṁ uppādetīti ādīnavānupassanā nāma jātaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:97_3: Tesuyeva saṅkhāresu nibbindamānaṁ uppannanti nibbidānupassanā nāma jāta’’nti.
anya-e0102n9:100_1: Iminā pana nibbidāñāṇena imassa kulaputtassa nibbindantassa ukkaṇṭhantassa anabhiramantassa sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagatesu
anya-e0102n9:100_2: sabhedakesu saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṁ na sajjati,
anya-e0102n9:100_15: sapattaparivārito purisoti evamādayo tato tato muccitukāmā nissaritukāmāva honti,
anya-e0102n9:100_16: evaṁ tassa yogino cittaṁ sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmaṁ nissaritukāmaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:100_17: Athassa evaṁ sabbasaṅkhāresu vigatālayassa sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmassa uppajjati muñcitukamyatā ñāṇanti.

anya-e0102n9:167_0: Sace panassa dukkhato anattato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n9:167_3: Esa nayo dukkhato anattato abhinivisitvā sesavuṭṭhānesupi.
anya-e0102n9:169_1: Idāni saddhiṁ purimapacchimañāṇehi imissā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya āvibhāvatthaṁ dvādasa upamā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n9:170_0: ‘‘Vaggulī kaṇhasappo ca, gharaṁ go yakkhi dārako;
anya-e0102n9:171_0: Khuddaṁ pipāsaṁ sītuṇhaṁ, andhakāraṁ visena cā’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:172_0: Imā ca upamā bhayatupaṭṭhānato pabhuti yattha katthaci ñāṇe ṭhatvā āharituṁ vaṭṭeyyuṁ.
anya-e0102n9:172_1: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne āhariyamānāsu bhayatupaṭṭhānato yāva phalañāṇaṁ sabbaṁ pākaṭaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n9:173_0: 790.Vaggulīti ekā kira vaggulī ‘‘ettha pupphaṁ vā phalaṁ vā labhissāmī’’ti pañcasākhe madhukarukkhe nilīyitvā
anya-e0102n9:173_1: ekaṁ sākhaṁ parāmasitvā na tattha kiñci pupphaṁ phalaṁ vā gayhupagaṁ addasa.
anya-e0102n9:173_7: natthettha kiñci gayhupaga’’nti tasmiṁ rukkhe ālayaṁ vissajjetvā ujukāya sākhāya āruyha viṭapantarena
anya-e0102n9:173_8: sīsaṁ nīharitvā uddhaṁ ulloketvā ākāse uppatitvā aññasmiṁ phalarukkhe nilīyati.
anya-e0102n9:174_2: tattha vagguliyā nilīyanaṁ viya yogino khandhapañcake abhiniveso,
anya-e0102n9:174_3: tassā ekekaṁ sākhaṁ parāmasitvā kiñci gayhupagaṁ adisvā avasesasākhāparāmasanaṁ viya yogino rūpakkhandhaṁ
anya-e0102n9:174_4: sammasitvā tattha kiñci gayhupagaṁ adisvā avasesakkhandhasammasanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:174_5: tassā ‘‘aphalo vatāyaṁ rukkho’’ti rukkhe ālayavissajjanaṁ viya yogino pañcasupi khandhesu aniccalakkhaṇādidassanavasena
anya-e0102n9:174_7: tassā ujukāya sākhāya upari ārohanaṁ viya yogino anulomaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:174_8: sīsaṁ nīharitvā uddhaṁ ullokanaṁ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:175_2: muñcitvā āgatamaggaṁ olokentassa ṭhānaṁ viya maggañāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:175_3: gantvā abhayaṭṭhāne ṭhānaṁ viya phalañāṇanti ayaṁ viseso.
anya-e0102n9:176_0: 792.Gharanti gharasāmike kira sāyaṁ bhuñjitvā sayanaṁ āruyha niddaṁ okkante gharaṁ ādittaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:176_1: so pabujjhitvā aggiṁ disvā ‘‘bhīto sādhu vatassa sace aḍayhamāno nikkhameyya’’nti olokayamāno maggaṁ
anya-e0102n9:176_2: disvā nikkhamitvā vegena khemaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā ṭhito.
anya-e0102n9:176_3: Tattha gharasāmikassa bhuñjitvā sayanaṁ āruyha niddokkamanaṁ viya bālaputhujjanassa khandhapañcake ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:176_4: Pabujjhitvā aggiṁ disvā bhītakālo viya sammāpaṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā lakkhaṇaṁ disvā bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:177_0: 793.Goti ekassa kira kassakassa rattibhāge niddaṁ okkantassa vajaṁ bhinditvā goṇā palātā,
anya-e0102n9:177_1: so paccūsasamaye tattha gantvā olokento tesaṁ palātabhāvaṁ ñatvā anupadaṁ gantvā rañño goṇe addasa.
anya-e0102n9:177_2: Te ‘‘mayhaṁ goṇā’’ti sallakkhetvā āharanto pabhātakāle ‘‘na ime mayhaṁ goṇā,
anya-e0102n9:177_3: rañño goṇā’’ti sañjānitvā ‘‘yāva maṁ ‘coro aya’nti gahetvā rājapurisā na anayabyasanaṁ pāpenti,
anya-e0102n9:177_4: tāvadeva palāyissāmī’’ti bhīto goṇe pahāya vegena palāyitvā nibbhayaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n9:177_5: Tattha ‘‘mayhaṁ goṇā’’ti rājagoṇānaṁ gahaṇaṁ viya bālaputhujjanassa ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti khandhānaṁ gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:177_6: pabhāte ‘‘rājagoṇā’’ti sañjānanaṁ viya yogino tilakkhaṇavasena khandhānaṁ ‘‘aniccā dukkhā anattā’’ti sañjānanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:178_0: 794.Yakkhīti eko kira puriso yakkhiniyā saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0102n9:178_1: sā rattibhāge ‘‘sutto aya’’nti mantvā āmakasusānaṁ gantvā manussamaṁsaṁ khādati.
anya-e0102n9:178_2: So ‘‘kuhiṁ esā gacchatī’’ti anubandhitvā manussamaṁsaṁ khādamānaṁ disvā tassā amanussibhāvaṁ ñatvā ‘‘yāva maṁ na khādati,
anya-e0102n9:178_3: tāva palāyissāmī’’ti bhīto vegena palāyitvā khemaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n9:178_4: Tattha yakkhiniyā saddhiṁ saṁvāso viya khandhānaṁ ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti gahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:178_5: susāne manussamaṁsaṁ khādamānaṁ disvā ‘‘yakkhinī aya’’nti jānanaṁ viya khandhānaṁ tilakkhaṇaṁ disvā aniccādibhāvajānanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:179_1: sā uparipāsāde nisinnāva antaravīthiyaṁ dārakasaddaṁ sutvā ‘‘putto nu kho me kenaci viheṭhiyatī’’ti vegasā
anya-e0102n9:179_3: Sā ‘‘paraputto aya’’nti sañjānitvā ottappamānā ito cito ca oloketvā ‘‘mā heva maṁ koci ‘dārakacorī aya’nti
anya-e0102n9:179_4: vadeyyā’’ti dārakaṁ tattheva oropetvā puna vegasā pāsādaṁ āruyha nisīdi.
anya-e0102n9:179_5: Tattha attano puttasaññāya paraputtassa gahaṇaṁ viya ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti pañcakkhandhagahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:179_9: ito cito ca olokanaṁ viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:180_1: andhakāraṁ visena cāti imā pana cha upamā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya ṭhitassa lokuttaradhammābhimukhaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:180_2: Yathā hi khuddāya abhibhūto sujighacchito puriso sādurasaṁ bhojanaṁ pattheti,
anya-e0102n9:180_3: evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭajighacchāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro amatarasaṁ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:181_0: Yathā ca pipāsito puriso parisussamānakaṇṭhamukho anekaṅgasambhāraṁ pānakaṁ pattheti,
anya-e0102n9:181_1: evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭapipāsāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggapānakaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:182_0: Yathā pana sītasamphuṭṭho puriso uṇhaṁ pattheti,
anya-e0102n9:182_1: evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭe taṇhāsinehasītena phuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesasantāpakaṁ maggatejaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:183_0: Yathā ca uṇhasamphuṭṭho puriso sītaṁ pattheti,
anya-e0102n9:183_1: evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭe ekādasaggisantāpasantatto yogāvacaro ekādasaggivūpasamaṁ nibbānaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:184_0: Yathā pana andhakārapareto puriso ālokaṁ pattheti,
anya-e0102n9:184_1: evamevāyaṁ avijjandhakārena onaddhapariyonaddho yogāvacaro ñāṇālokaṁ maggabhāvanaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:185_0: Yathā ca visasamphuṭṭho puriso visaghātanaṁ bhesajjaṁ pattheti,
anya-e0102n9:185_1: evamevāyaṁ kilesavisasamphuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesavisanimmathanaṁ amatosadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:185_4: navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṁ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati.
anya-e0102n9:185_6: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakapoṇe’’ti sabbaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:186_0: 797. Ettāvatā ca panesa patilīnacaro nāma hoti, yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ –
anya-e0102n9:190_0: Yo attānaṁ bhavane na dassaye’’ti. (su. ni. 816; mahāni. 45);
anya-e0102n9:191_0: Evamidaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ yogino patilīnacarabhāvaṁ niyametvā uttari ariyamaggassāpi bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgapaṭipadāvimokkhavisesaṁ niyameti.
anya-e0102n9:191_1: Keci hi therā bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgānaṁ visesaṁ pādakajjhānaṁ niyametīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n9:191_2: Keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n9:191_4: Tesampi vādesu ayaṁ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n9:192_4: paṭhamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikāva honti.
anya-e0102n9:192_5: Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti.
anya-e0102n9:192_6: Tesaṁ hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṁ patvā somanassasahagatā hoti.
anya-e0102n9:192_7: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva jhānaṁ caturaṅgikaṁ tivaṅgikaṁ duvaṅgikañca hoti.
anya-e0102n9:192_10: Ayaṁ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca hoti.
anya-e0102n9:192_11: Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
anya-e0102n9:192_13: Pañcamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
anya-e0102n9:192_15: Imasmiṁ hi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti.
anya-e0102n9:192_17: Arūpajjhānāni pādakaṁ katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0102n9:192_18: Evaṁ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya yekeci saṅkhāre sammasitvā nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti
anya-e0102n9:192_19: attano sadisabhāvaṁ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
anya-e0102n9:193_1: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti,
anya-e0102n9:194_1: Tatiyattheravāde attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṁ yaṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā ye ye jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito,
anya-e0102n9:194_3: Pādakajjhānaṁ pana sammasitajjhānaṁ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva taṁ na ijjhati.
anya-e0102n9:194_7: Evaṁ tāva saṅkhārupekkhā bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgāni niyametīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n9:195_1: Sace panāyaṁ ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā dukkhena sappayogena sasaṅkhārena vikkhambhetuṁ asakkhi,
anya-e0102n9:195_4: Kilese pana vikkhambhetvā vipassanāparivāsaṁ maggapātubhāvaṁ saṇikaṁ kurumānā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n9:195_6: Iti ayaṁ saṅkhārupekkhā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano attano maggassa nāmaṁ deti.
anya-e0102n9:196_0: Sā panāyaṁ paṭipadā kassaci bhikkhuno nānā hoti,
anya-e0102n9:196_2: Buddhānaṁ pana cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva ahesuṁ.
anya-e0102n9:196_4: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño ahosi.
anya-e0102n9:196_7: evaṁ adhipatayopi kassaci bhikkhuno catūsu maggesu nānā honti.
anya-e0102n9:197_1: Apica maggo nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṁ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā.
anya-e0102n9:197_2: Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n9:198_0: Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya saṅkhārānaṁ ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni pajahanto āgato,
anya-e0102n9:198_2: Dukkhānupassanāya pana sukhasaññaṁ pahāya paṇidhiṁ patthanaṁ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito.
anya-e0102n9:198_3: Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṁ pahāya saṅkhārānaṁ suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṁ paccanīkato nāmaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n9:199_2: rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṁ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:200_0: Svāyaṁ suññaṁ animittaṁ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotītipi suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n9:201_8: Idaṁ pana nāmaṁ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati,
anya-e0102n9:201_10: Tatra hi gotrabhuñāṇaṁ animittaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā animittanāmakaṁ hutvā sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṁ detīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n9:201_13: Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṁ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma,
anya-e0102n9:201_16: Evaṁ vipassanā attano nāmaṁ maggassa deti,
anya-e0102n9:204_1: Tassa taṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa adhimokkhasaddhā balavatarā nibbattati,
anya-e0102n9:204_6: Tassa ‘‘dāni maggo uppajjissatī’’ti saṅkhārupekkhā saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṁ otarati.
anya-e0102n9:204_7: Bhavaṅgānantaraṁ saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayeneva saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā ārammaṇaṁ kurumānaṁ uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:204_8: Tato bhavaṅgaṁ āvaṭṭetvā uppannassa tassa kiriyacittassānantaraṁ avīcikaṁ cittasantatiṁ anuppabandhamānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:204_9: tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati paṭhamaṁ javanacittaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:204_11: Tadanantaraṁ tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati dutiyaṁ javanacittaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:204_13: Tadanantarampi tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati tatiyaṁ javanacittaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:205_0: Avisesena pana tividhampetaṁ āsevanantipi parikammantipi upacārantipi anulomantipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0102n9:205_3: Tañhi purimānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ vipassanāñāṇānaṁ tathakiccatāya ca anulometi,
anya-e0102n9:205_6: ‘‘udayabbayavantānaṁyeva vata dhammānaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ uppādavaye addasā’’ti ca,
anya-e0102n9:205_13: ‘‘upekkhitabbaṁyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita’’nti ca atthato vadamānaṁ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṁ ñāṇānaṁ tathakiccatāya anulometi,
anya-e0102n9:205_14: upari ca sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ tāya paṭipattiyā pattabbattā.
anya-e0102n9:206_0: Yathā hi dhammiko rājā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisinno vohārikamahāmattānaṁ vinicchayaṁ sutvā agatigamanaṁ pahāya
anya-e0102n9:206_1: majjhatto hutvā ‘‘evaṁ hotū’’ti anumodamāno tesañca vinicchayassa anulometi,
anya-e0102n9:206_7: Tattha yathā rājā ‘‘evaṁ hotū’’ti vadamāno vohārikānañca vinicchayassa,
anya-e0102n9:206_9: evamidaṁ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjamānaṁ aṭṭhannañca ñāṇānaṁ tathakiccatāya anulometi,
anya-e0102n9:209_1: Idañca pana anulomañāṇaṁ saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:209_2: Sabbena sabbaṁ pana gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:209_3: Idāni tassāyeva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya asammohatthaṁ ayaṁ suttasaṁsandanā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n9:211_2: nissāya atammayataṁ āgamma yāyaṁ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā,
anya-e0102n9:212_0: Alagaddasuttante ‘‘nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.245) evaṁ nibbidāti vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:216_0: Paṭisambhidāmagge ‘‘yā ca muñcitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā,
anya-e0102n9:216_1: ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nāna’’nti (paṭi. ma.
anya-e0102n9:217_0: Paṭṭhāne ‘‘anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassā’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417) evaṁ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
